author: Emily Rauhala
title: China is declaring victory over coronavirus in Wuhan. That's cause for hope — and skepticism.
description: Questions emerge about "zero new cases" claims in the city where the pandemic began.
content:
In a country emerging from a crushing lockdown and world looking for answers lower case counts appear to be genuinely good news. Other countries have closely watched the crisis in Wuhan for lessons on how best to control a local outbreak.
But Wuhans near-zer… [+5582 chars]
